title: Ep. 36 | 2 Bears 1 Cave w/ Tom Segura & Bert Kreischer
description: Tom Segura and Bert Kreischer start off this episode of 2 Bears, 1 Cave by discussing why they would make a good couple, and Bert pitches a new show idea. They give Nikki Glaser a call to run the idea by her. Bert also reveals how much Kool-Aid he consumes in a day. The bears also taste test various sodas, talk about their favorite sneakers, and explore new religions.
author: 2bears1cave@gmail.com (2 Bears 1 Cave)
